div.p: However, those who come from Italy affirm that the Pope, the Florentine, and the Ferrara alliance have come together; there are those who doubt whether the Venetians have also secretly joined them.

As for us, we will exercise the greatest possible moderation; however, nothing more will be done about these matters before the assemblies, and if we can achieve even that, namely, that the bishops do not sit in the assemblies, which we hope we can achieve, we will be content for the present, although I am not pressing the matter. We only teach our people what needs to be done.
